title: Field Methods Cohort
notes: Graduate phonology cohort designing a project codename that is memorable yet academically neutral.

names.label: Sonora
names.meaning: Signals warm resonance and field audio practice

names.label: GlossaLab
names.meaning: Echoes articulatory focus with lab neutrality

scenarios.title: Conference Poster Reveal
scenarios.goal: Name should highlight collaborative phonetic analysis and feel welcoming to community partners.
scenarios.stressTest: Avoid similarity with existing labs such as LinguaLab or Sonority Lab to reduce confusion.
scenarios.riskNotes: Participants include Dene and Salish speakers; aim for respectful consonant patterns.

scenarios.title: Field Kit Labelling
scenarios.goal: Short sticker-friendly word that encodes sound documentation toolkit vibes.
scenarios.stressTest: Must stay legible on handheld recorders under low light.
scenarios.riskNotes: Should not resemble commercial recorder model names (Zoom, Tascam, Sony).
